sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- No changes to template section -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'StreamCheck',
  data() {
    return {
      // No changes to data section
    }
  },
  computed: {
    // No changes to computed section
  },
  created() {
    // No changes to created section
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    // No changes to beforeDestroy section
  },
  methods: {
    async checkStream(stream) {
      const ffprobePath = localStorage.getItem('ffprobePath')
      if (!ffprobePath) {
        this.$message.error('请先在系统设置中配置FFprobe路径')
        return false
      }

      try {
        const response = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/check-stream`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({
            url: stream.url,
            ffprobePath: ffprobePath
          })
        })

        if (!response.ok) throw new Error('请求失败')
        
        const result = await response.json()
        
        // 更新流信息
        stream.status = result.available ? '正常' : '异常'
        stream.resolution = result.resolution || ''
        stream.responseTime = result.responseTime || 0

        // 检查是否需要自动清除
        if (this.shouldRemoveStream(stream)) {
          let reason = ''
          if (stream.status === '异常') {
            reason = '异常源'
          } else if (stream.responseTime > 3000) {
            reason = '响应时间过慢'
          } else {
            reason = '分辨率过低'
          }

          // 找到当前页的所有项
          const currentPageItems = this.paginatedData
          // 找到要删除项在当前页的索引
          const pageIndex = currentPageItems.indexOf(stream)
          // 找到要删除项在整个列表中的索引
          const listIndex = this.streamList.indexOf(stream)
          
          if (listIndex > -1) {
            this.streamList.splice(listIndex, 1)
            // 如果删除的是当前页的最后一项，且不是第一页，则跳转到上一页
            if (pageIndex === currentPageItems.length - 1 && this.currentPage > 1) {
              this.currentPage--
            }
            // 添加删除原因提示
            this.$message.warning(`已自动清除直播源：${reason}`)
          }
        }
        
        this.saveStreamList()
        return result.available
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('检测错误:', error)
        stream.status = '异常'
        return false
      }
    },

    async handleBatchCheck() {
      if (this.isChecking) return
      
      const uncheckedStreams = this.streamList.filter(s => !this.isPaused || this.streamList.indexOf(s) > this.pausedIndex)
      if (uncheckedStreams.length === 0) {
        this.$message.info('没有需要检测的直播源')
        return
      }

      this.isChecking = true
      this.shouldStop = false
      this.totalCount = uncheckedStreams.length
      this.checkedCount = this.isPaused ? this.checkedCount : 0
      
      // 获取并发检测数量设置
      const concurrentChecks = parseInt(localStorage.getItem('concurrentChecks')) || 3
      
      try {
        // 从暂停的位置或开始位置继续检测
        const startIndex = this.isPaused ? this.pausedIndex + 1 : 0
        
        // 使用并发检测
        for (let i = startIndex; i < uncheckedStreams.length; i += concurrentChecks) {
          if (this.shouldStop) break
          
          // 获取当前批次要检测的流
          const batch = uncheckedStreams.slice(i, i + concurrentChecks)
          
          // 并发检测当前批次的所有流
          await Promise.all(
            batch.map(async stream => {
              if (this.shouldStop) return
              
              stream.status = '检测中'
              const success = await this.checkStream(stream)
              this.checkedCount++
              
              if (success) {
                this.saveState()
              }
            })
          )
          
          // 更新暂停位置
          this.pausedIndex = i + concurrentChecks - 1
        }

        if (!this.shouldStop) {
          this.isChecking = false
          this.isPaused = false
          this.pausedIndex = -1
          this.$message.success('批量检测完成')
          
          // 如果开启了自动同步，则在检测完成后触发同步
          if (localStorage.getItem('githubAutoSync') === 'true') {
            try {
              // 使用保存的GitHub设置进行同步
              const syncForm = {
                token: localStorage.getItem('githubToken'),
                repo: localStorage.getItem('githubRepo'),
                txtPath: localStorage.getItem('githubTxtPath'),
                m3uPath: localStorage.getItem('githubM3uPath'),
                message: '自动同步：批量检测完成'
              }
              
              // 同步 TXT 内容
              const txtContent = this.generateContent('txt')
              await this.syncToGithub(txtContent, syncForm.txtPath)
              
              // 同步 M3U 内容
              const m3uContent = this.generateContent('m3u')
              await this.syncToGithub(m3uContent, syncForm.m3uPath)
              
              this.$message.success('自动同步完成')
            } catch (error) {
              this.$message.error('自动同步失败: ' + (error.message || '未知错误'))
            }
          }
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('批量检测错误:', error)
        this.$message.error('批量检测失败')
      } finally {
        if (this.shouldStop) {
          this.isChecking = false
          this.isPaused = true
          this.$message.info('检测已暂停')
        }
      }
    },

    pauseCheck() {
      this.shouldStop = true
    },

    async resumeCheck() {
      if (this.pausedIndex >= 0) {
        this.isChecking = true
        this.isPaused = false
        this.shouldStop = false
        await this.batchCheck(this.pausedIndex)
      }
    },

    async handleCheck(row) {
      row.status = '检测中'
      
      const success = await this.checkStream(row)
      this.$message[success ? 'success' : 'error'](`检测${success ? '成功' : '失败'}: ${row.name}`)
    },
    handleDelete(row) {
      this.$confirm('确认删除该直播源?', '提示', {
        confirmButtonText: '确定',
        cancelButtonText: '取消',
        type: 'warning'
      }).then(() => {
        const index = this.streamList.indexOf(row)
        this.streamList.splice(index, 1)
        const maxPage = Math.ceil(this.streamList.length / this.pageSize)
        if (this.currentPage > maxPage) {
          this.currentPage = Math.max(maxPage, 1)
        }
        this.saveStreamList()  // 保存更新后的列表
        this.$message.success('删除成功')
      }).catch(() => {})
    },
    async handleUrlImport() {
      const valid = await this.$refs.importForm.validate()
      if (!valid) return

      try {
        // 先发送请求到后端，让后端去获取文件内容
        const response = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/import-url`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({ url: this.importForm.url })
        })

        if (!response.ok) throw new Error('导入失败')

        const content = await response.text()
        const newStreams = this.parseContent(content)

        if (newStreams.length > 0) {
          // 过滤重复的直播源
          const existingUrls = new Set(this.streamList.map(s => s.url))
          const uniqueStreams = newStreams.filter(s => !existingUrls.has(s.url))
          
          if (uniqueStreams.length > 0) {
            this.streamList.push(...uniqueStreams)
            this.$message.success(`成功导入 ${uniqueStreams.length} 个直播源`)
            this.importUrlDialogVisible = false
          } else {
            this.$message.info('没有新的直播源可以导入')
          }
        } else {
          this.$message.warning('未找到有效的直播源')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        this.$message.error('导入失败：' + error.message)
      }
    },
    readFile(file) {
      return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        const reader = new FileReader()
        reader.onload = (e) => resolve(e.target.result)
        reader.onerror = () => reject(new Error('文件读取失败'))
        reader.readAsText(file)
      })
    },
    parseContent(content) {
      const lines = content.split('\n')
      const streams = []
      let currentGroup = '未分组'

      // 检测是否是 m3u 格式
      if (content.includes('#EXTM3U')) {
        let currentName = ''
        let currentGroupTitle = ''

        lines.forEach(line => {
          line = line.trim()
          if (!line) return

          if (line.startsWith('#EXTINF:')) {
            // 尝试不同的名称提取方式
            let name = ''
            
            // 1. 尝试提取 tvg-name 属性
            const tvgNameMatch = line.match(/tvg-name="([^"]+)"/i)
            if (tvgNameMatch) {
              name = tvgNameMatch[1].trim()
            }
            
            // 2. 如果没有 tvg-name，尝试提取最后的逗号后的名称
            if (!name) {
              const lastCommaIndex = line.lastIndexOf(',')
              if (lastCommaIndex !== -1) {
                name = line.substring(lastCommaIndex + 1).trim()
              }
            }
            
            // 3. 如果还是没有名称，尝试提取 tvg-id
            if (!name) {
              const tvgIdMatch = line.match(/tvg-id="([^"]+)"/i)
              if (tvgIdMatch) {
                name = tvgIdMatch[1].trim()
              } else {
                // 3.1 尝试提取不带引号的 tvg-id
                const tvgIdNoQuoteMatch = line.match(/tvg-id=([^,\s]+)/i)
                if (tvgIdNoQuoteMatch) {
                  name = tvgIdNoQuoteMatch[1].trim()
                }
              }
            }

            currentName = name || '未命名'
            
            // 提取分组信息
            // 1. 先尝试带引号的 group-title
            const groupMatch = line.match(/group-title="([^"]+)"/i)
            if (groupMatch) {
              currentGroupTitle = groupMatch[1].trim()
            } else {
              // 2. 尝试不带引号的 group-title
              const groupNoQuoteMatch = line.match(/group-title=([^,\s]+)/i)
              if (groupNoQuoteMatch) {
                currentGroupTitle = groupNoQuoteMatch[1].trim()
              }
            }
          } else if (!line.startsWith('#') && line.trim()) {
            // 这是一个媒体URL行
            if (currentName) {
              streams.push({
                name: currentName,
                url: line.trim(),
                group: currentGroupTitle || currentGroup,
                status: '未检测',
                resolution: '',
                responseTime: 0
              })
            }
            currentName = ''  // 重置当前名称
          }
        })
      } else {
        // txt 格式处理
        lines.forEach(line => {
          line = line.trim()
          if (!line) return

          // 检查是否是分组标记
          if (line.endsWith(',#genre#')) {
            currentGroup = line.replace(',#genre#', '')
            return
          }

          // 解析直播源行
          const [name, urls] = line.split(',')
          if (!name || !urls) return

          // 检查是否包含多个URL（用#分隔）
          const urlList = urls.split('#')
          
          // 为每个URL创建一个新的直播源条目
          urlList.forEach(url => {
            if (url && url.trim()) {
              streams.push({
                name: name,
                url: url.trim(),
                group: currentGroup,
                status: '未检测',
                resolution: '',
                responseTime: 0
              })
            }
          })
        })
      }

      return streams
    },
    addStreamsToList(streams) {
      streams.forEach(stream => {
        this.streamList.push(stream)
      })
      this.currentPage = 1
      this.saveStreamList()  // 保存更新后的列表
    },
    handleSizeChange(val) {
      this.pageSize = val
      // 当每页条数改变时，重置当前页为第一页
      this.currentPage = 1
    },
    handleCurrentChange(val) {
      this.currentPage = val
    },
    async handleFileUpload(event) {
      const file = event.target.files[0]
      if (!file) return

      try {
        const content = await this.readFile(file)
        const newStreams = this.parseContent(content)
        
        if (newStreams.length > 0) {
          // 过滤重复的直播源
          const existingUrls = new Set(this.streamList.map(s => s.url))
          const uniqueStreams = newStreams.filter(s => !existingUrls.has(s.url))
          
          if (uniqueStreams.length > 0) {
            this.streamList.push(...uniqueStreams)
            this.$message.success(`成功导入 ${uniqueStreams.length} 个直播源`)
          } else {
            this.$message.info('没有新的直播源可以导入')
          }
        } else {
          this.$message.warning('未找到有效的直播源')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        this.$message.error('文件读取失败：' + error.message)
      } finally {
        // 清除文件输入，允许重复选择同一文件
        event.target.value = ''
      }
    },
    getGroupFromFileName(filename) {
      // 从文件名中提取可能的分组名
      const name = filename.toLowerCase()
      if (name.includes('cctv')) return 'CCTV'
      if (name.includes('卫视')) return '卫视'
      if (name.includes('地方')) return '地方台'
      return '未分组'
    },
    handleClearList() {
      if (this.streamList.length === 0) {
        this.$message.warning('列表已经为空')
        return
      }

      this.$confirm('确认清空所有直播源?', '提示', {
        confirmButtonText: '确定',
        cancelButtonText: '取消',
        type: 'warning'
      }).then(() => {
        this.streamList = []
        this.currentPage = 1
        this.saveStreamList()  // 保存更新后的列表
        this.$message.success('列表已清空')
      }).catch(() => {})
    },
    handleCopy(row) {
      // 创建一个临时输入框来实现复制功能
      const textarea = document.createElement('textarea')
      textarea.value = row.url
      document.body.appendChild(textarea)
      textarea.select()
      
      try {
        document.execCommand('copy')
        this.$message.success('链接已复制到剪贴板')
      } catch (err) {
        this.$message.error('复制失败')
      } finally {
        document.body.removeChild(textarea)
      }
    },
    shouldRemoveStream(stream) {
      // 检查是否需要清除异常源
      if (localStorage.getItem('autoRemoveInvalid') === 'true' && 
          stream.status === '异常') {
        return true
      }

      // 获取模式设置
      const extremeMode = localStorage.getItem('extremeMode') === 'true'
      const strictMode = localStorage.getItem('strictMode') === 'true'

      // 检查是否需要清除低分辨率源
      if (localStorage.getItem('autoRemoveLowRes') === 'true' && 
          stream.resolution !== '未知') {
        const [width, height] = stream.resolution.split('x').map(Number)
        if (extremeMode ? (width < 1920 || height < 1080) : 
            (strictMode ? (width < 1920 || height < 1080) : (width < 1280 || height < 720))) {
          return true
        }
      }

      // 检查响应时间
      if (localStorage.getItem('autoRemoveSlowResponse') === 'true' && 
          stream.responseTime > (extremeMode ? 1500 : (strictMode ? 2000 : 3000))) {
        return true
      }

      return false
    },
    saveStreamList() {
      if (localStorage.getItem('persistentData') === 'true') {
        localStorage.setItem('streamList', JSON.stringify(this.streamList))
      }
    },
    handleCollectMode() {
      if (this.isCollecting) {
        this.stopCollecting()
      } else {
        this.collectDialogVisible = true
      }
    },
    async startCollecting(isRestore = false) {
      if (!isRestore) {
        // 确保 urls 是数组
        if (!Array.isArray(this.collectForm.urls)) {
          this.$set(this.collectForm, 'urls', [''])
          return
        }
        
        const valid = await this.$refs.collectForm.validate()
        if (!valid) return
      }

      this.collectDialogVisible = false
      this.isCollecting = true
      this.saveState() // 保存状态
      
      // 立即执行一次采集
      await this.collect()
      
      // 如果开启了自动采集，设置定时器
      if (this.collectForm.autoCollect) {
        this.setupCollectSchedule()
      } else {
        // 单次采集完成后停止
        this.isCollecting = false
        this.saveState()
      }
    },
    stopCollecting() {
      this.isCollecting = false
      if (this.collectTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.collectTimer)
        this.collectTimer = null
      }
      this.saveState() // 保存状态
      // 只有在自动采集模式下才显示停止提示
      if (this.collectForm.autoCollect) {
        this.$message.success('已停止采集')
      }
    },
    async collect() {
      try {
        // 检查是否有检测正在进行
        if (this.isChecking) {
          this.$message.warning('检测正在进行中，暂时跳过本次采集')
          return
        }

        this.$message.info('开始采集直播源...')

        // 并发采集所有地址
        const results = await Promise.allSettled(
          this.collectForm.urls.map(async url => {
            try {
              const response = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/collect-url?url=${encodeURIComponent(url)}`, {
                method: 'GET',
                headers: {
                  'Accept': 'text/plain'
                },
              })
              if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`采集失败: ${url}`)
              
              const content = await response.text()
              const newStreams = this.parseContent(content)
              
              // 过滤重复的直播源，同时考虑正在检测的源
              const existingUrls = new Set(this.streamList.map(s => s.url))
              return newStreams.filter(s => {
                // 如果源已存在且正在检测中，保留原有状态
                const existingStream = this.streamList.find(es => es.url === s.url)
                if (existingStream && existingStream.status === '检测中') {
                  return false
                }
                return !existingUrls.has(s.url)
              })
            } catch (error) {
              console.error(`采集地址 ${url} 失败:`, error)
              return []
            }
          })
        )

        // 合并所有采集结果
        const allNewStreams = results
          .filter(result => result.status === 'fulfilled')
          .flatMap(result => result.value)
          .filter((stream, index, self) => 
            index === self.findIndex(s => s.url === stream.url)
          )

        // 添加新的直播源到列表
        if (allNewStreams.length > 0) {
          this.addStreamsToList(allNewStreams)
          this.$message.success(`采集成功: 新增${allNewStreams.length}个直播源`)
        } else {
          this.$message.info('未发现新的直播源')
        }

        // 统计失败的地址
        const failedUrls = results
          .filter(result => result.status === 'rejected')
          .length

        if (failedUrls > 0) {
          this.$message.warning(`${failedUrls}个地址采集失败`)
        }

      } catch (error) {
        this.$message.error('采集失败：' + error.message)
        if (!this.collectForm.autoCollect) {
          this.stopCollecting()
        }
      }
    },
    async handleGenerateLink() {
      this.generateLinkDialogVisible = true
      try {
        // 先生成 TXT 格式链接
        const txtResponse = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/generate-link`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'text/plain',
            'X-File-Format': 'txt'
          },
          body: this.generateContent('txt')
        })
        
        // 再生成 M3U 格式链接
        const m3uResponse = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/generate-link`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'text/plain',
            'X-File-Format': 'm3u'
          },
          body: this.generateContent('m3u')
        })
        
        if (txtResponse.ok && m3uResponse.ok) {
          const txtLink = await txtResponse.text()
          const m3uLink = await m3uResponse.text()
          
          // 根据当前选择的格式显示对应的链接
          this.generatedLinks = {
            txt: txtLink,
            m3u: m3uLink
          }
          this.generatedLink = this.generatedLinks[this.linkForm.format]
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('生成链接失败：', error)
        this.$message.error('生成链接失败')
      }
    },
    generateContent(format) {
      return format === 'txt' ? this.generateTxtContent() : this.generateM3uContent()
    },
    generateTxtContent() {
      let content = ''
      let currentGroup = ''
      
      // 对每个分组内的直播源按响应速度排序
      const sortedStreams = [...this.mergedStreams].sort((a, b) => {
        if (a.group !== b.group) return 0  // 不同分组不改变顺序
        const aTime = Number(a.responseTime) || Infinity
        const bTime = Number(b.responseTime) || Infinity
        return aTime - bTime
      })
      
      sortedStreams.forEach(stream => {
        if (stream.group !== currentGroup) {
          currentGroup = stream.group
          content += `${currentGroup},#genre#\n`
        }
        content += `${stream.name},${stream.urls.join('#')}\n`
      })
      
      return content.trim()
    },
    generateM3uContent() {
      let content = '#EXTM3U\n'
      let currentGroup = ''
      
      // 对每个分组内的直播源按响应速度排序
      const sortedStreams = [...this.mergedStreams].sort((a, b) => {
        if (a.group !== b.group) return 0  // 不同分组不改变顺序
        const aTime = Number(a.responseTime) || Infinity
        const bTime = Number(b.responseTime) || Infinity
        return aTime - bTime
      })
      
      sortedStreams.forEach(stream => {
        if (stream.group !== currentGroup) {
          currentGroup = stream.group
          content += `\n#EXTINF:-1 group-title="${currentGroup}"\n`
        }
        stream.urls.forEach(url => {
          content += `#EXTINF:-1,${stream.name}\n${url}\n`
        })
      })
      
      return content.trim()
    },
    copyGeneratedLink() {
      const textarea = document.createElement('textarea')
      textarea.value = this.generatedLink
      document.body.appendChild(textarea)
      textarea.select()
      
      try {
        document.execCommand('copy')
        this.$message.success('链接已复制到剪贴板')
      } catch (err) {
        this.$message.error('复制失败')
      } finally {
        document.body.removeChild(textarea)
      }
    },
    downloadTxtFile() {
      const blob = new Blob([this.generatedLink], { type: 'text/plain;charset=utf-8' })
      const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob)
      const link = document.createElement('a')
      link.href = url
      link.download = `直播源列表_${new Date().toLocaleDateString()}.txt`
      
      document.body.appendChild(link)
      link.click()
      
      // 清理
      window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url)
      document.body.removeChild(link)
      this.$message.success('文件下载成功')
    },
    // 修改更新链接内容的方法
    async updateLinkContent() {
      try {
        // 更新 TXT 格式内容
        await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/update-content`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'text/plain',
            'X-File-Format': 'txt'
          },
          body: this.generateContent('txt')
        })
        
        // 更新 M3U 格式内容
        await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/update-content`, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'text/plain',
            'X-File-Format': 'm3u'
          },
          body: this.generateContent('m3u')
        })
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('更新链接内容失败：', error)
      }
    },
    handleScheduleCheck() {
      if (this.isScheduled) {
        this.stopScheduleCheck()
      } else {
        this.scheduleDialogVisible = true
      }
    },
    startScheduleCheck() {
      this.$refs.scheduleForm.validate(valid => {
        if (valid) {
          this.scheduleDialogVisible = false
          this.isScheduled = true
          this.setupSchedule()
          this.saveState() // 保存状态
          this.$message.success('定时检测已开启')
        }
      })
    },
    stopScheduleCheck() {
      if (this.scheduleTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.scheduleTimer)
        this.scheduleTimer = null
      }
      this.isScheduled = false
      this.nextScheduleTime = null
      this.saveState() // 保存状态
      this.$message.success('定时检测已停止')
    },
    setupSchedule() {
      // 清除现有定时器
      if (this.scheduleTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.scheduleTimer)
      }

      // 设置每分钟检查一次
      this.scheduleTimer = setInterval(() => {
        const now = new Date()
        const [hours, minutes] = this.scheduleForm.executeTime.split(':').map(Number)
        
        // 如果当前正在检测中，跳过这次执行
        if (this.isChecking) {
          return
        }

        // 检查是否到达执行时间
        const currentHours = now.getHours()
        const currentMinutes = now.getMinutes()
        const currentSeconds = now.getSeconds()
        
        // 只在每分钟的第0秒执行
        if (currentHours === hours && currentMinutes === minutes && currentSeconds === 0) {
          // 如果是每周模式，还需要检查是否是指定的星期几
          if (this.scheduleForm.scheduleType === 'weekly') {
            if (now.getDay().toString() === this.scheduleForm.weekDay) {
              this.handleBatchCheck()
            }
          } else {
            // 每天模式，直接执行
            this.handleBatchCheck()
          }
        }
      }, 1000) // 每秒检查一次
    },
    // 保存当前状态到本地存储
    saveState() {
      // 只保存基础数据和设置，不保存运行状态
      const state = {
        streamList: this.streamList,
        currentPage: this.currentPage,
        pageSize: this.pageSize,
        scheduleForm: this.scheduleForm,
        collectForm: this.collectForm
      }
      localStorage.setItem(this.stateKey, JSON.stringify(state))
    },
    // 从本地存储恢复状态
    restoreState() {
      try {
        const savedState = localStorage.getItem(this.stateKey)
        if (savedState) {
          const state = JSON.parse(savedState)
          
          // 只恢复基础数据和设置
          this.streamList = state.streamList || []
          this.currentPage = state.currentPage || 1
          this.pageSize = state.pageSize || 5
          this.scheduleForm = state.scheduleForm || this.scheduleForm
          this.collectForm = state.collectForm || this.collectForm

          // 重置所有运行状态
          this.isChecking = false
          this.isPaused = false
          this.isScheduled = false
          this.isCollecting = false
          this.checkedCount = 0
          this.totalCount = 0
          this.pausedIndex = -1
          this.nextScheduleTime = null
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('恢复状态失败：', error)
      }
    },
    // 添加重置所有运行状态的方法
    resetAllStates() {
      // 停止定时检测
      if (this.isScheduled) {
        this.stopScheduleCheck()
      }
      
      // 停止采集
      if (this.isCollecting) {
        this.stopCollecting()
      }
      
      // 停止批量检测
      if (this.isChecking) {
        this.shouldStop = true
        this.isChecking = false
        this.isPaused = false
      }
      
      // 重置所有状态
      this.isChecking = false
      this.isPaused = false
      this.isScheduled = false
      this.isCollecting = false
      this.checkedCount = 0
      this.totalCount = 0
      this.pausedIndex = -1
      this.nextScheduleTime = null
      
      // 清除所有定时器
      if (this.scheduleTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.scheduleTimer)
        this.scheduleTimer = null
      }
      if (this.collectTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.collectTimer)
        this.collectTimer = null
      }
      
      // 保存重置后的状态
      this.saveState()
      
      this.$message.success('所有运行状态已重置')
    },
    // 更新活动状态
    updateActiveStatus() {
      const hasActive = this.isChecking || this.isCollecting || this.isScheduled
      
      if (this.hasActiveOperations !== hasActive) {
        this.hasActiveOperations = hasActive
        if (hasActive) {
          // 添加刷新拦截
          window.addEventListener('beforeunload', this.handleBeforeUnload)
        } else {
          // 移除刷新拦截
          window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', this.handleBeforeUnload)
        }
      }
    },
    // 处理页面刷新
    handleBeforeUnload(e) {
      if (this.hasActiveOperations) {
        const message = '有正在执行的操作，确定要离开吗？'
        e.preventDefault()
        e.returnValue = message
        return message
      }
    },
    addCollectUrl() {
      if (!Array.isArray(this.collectForm.urls)) {
        // 如果 urls 不是数组，先初始化它
        this.$set(this.collectForm, 'urls', [''])
      } else {
        this.collectForm.urls.push('')
      }
    },
    removeCollectUrl(index) {
      if (Array.isArray(this.collectForm.urls) && this.collectForm.urls.length > 1) {
        this.collectForm.urls.splice(index, 1)
      }
    },
    // 添加判断分辨率标签类型的方法
    getResolutionTagType(resolution) {
      if (!resolution || resolution === '未知') return 'info'
      const [width] = resolution.split('x').map(Number)
      if (width >= 1920) return 'success'
      if (width >= 1280) return ''  // 默认类型
      return 'warning'
    },
    // 添加判断响应时间标签类型的方法
    getResponseTimeTagType(responseTime) {
      if (!responseTime) return 'info'
      if (responseTime <= 1000) return 'success'
      if (responseTime <= 2000) return ''  // 默认类型
      if (responseTime <= 3000) return 'warning'
      return 'danger'
    },
    setupCollectSchedule() {
      // 清除现有定时器
      if (this.collectTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.collectTimer)
      }

      // 设置每分钟检查一次
      this.collectTimer = setInterval(() => {
        const now = new Date()
        const [hours, minutes] = this.collectForm.executeTime.split(':').map(Number)
        
        // 检查是否到达执行时间
        const currentHours = now.getHours()
        const currentMinutes = now.getMinutes()
        const currentSeconds = now.getSeconds()
        
        // 只在每分钟的第0秒执行
        if (currentHours === hours && currentMinutes === minutes && currentSeconds === 0) {
          // 如果是每周模式，还需要检查是否是指定的星期几
          if (this.collectForm.collectType === 'weekly') {
            if (now.getDay().toString() === this.collectForm.weekDay) {
              this.collect()
            }
          } else {
            // 每天模式，直接执行
            this.collect()
          }
        }
      }, 1000) // 每秒检查一次
    },
    handleSearch() {
      this.filteredList = this.streamList.filter(item => {
        const nameMatch = !this.searchForm.name || 
          item.name.toLowerCase().includes(this.searchForm.name.toLowerCase())
        
        const groupMatch = !this.searchForm.group || 
          item.group === this.searchForm.group
        
        const statusMatch = !this.searchForm.status || 
          item.status === this.searchForm.status
        
        return nameMatch && groupMatch && statusMatch
      })
      
      // 重置到第一页
      this.currentPage = 1
      this.searchDialogVisible = false
    },
    resetSearch() {
      this.searchForm = {
        name: '',
        group: '',
        status: ''
      }
      this.filteredList = []
      this.currentPage = 1
    },
    // 获取真实IP地址
    async getRealIp() {
      try {
        const response = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/local-ip`)
        if (response.ok) {
          const data = await response.json()
          this.realIp = data.ip
          localStorage.setItem('realIp', data.ip)  // 保存真实IP到localStorage
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('获取IP失败:', error)
      }
    },
    // 获取基础URL
    getBaseUrl() {
      const useRealIp = localStorage.getItem('useRealIp') === 'true'
      return useRealIp && this.realIp ? `http://${this.realIp}:8080` : 'http://localhost:8080'
    },
    async handleSync() {
      try {
        await this.$refs.syncForm.validate()
        
        // 保存设置
        localStorage.setItem('githubToken', this.syncForm.token)
        localStorage.setItem('githubRepo', this.syncForm.repo)
        localStorage.setItem('githubTxtPath', this.syncForm.txtPath)
        localStorage.setItem('githubM3uPath', this.syncForm.m3uPath)
        localStorage.setItem('githubAutoSync', this.syncForm.autoSync)
        localStorage.setItem('githubSyncType', this.syncForm.syncType)
        localStorage.setItem('githubExecuteTime', this.syncForm.executeTime)
        localStorage.setItem('githubWeekDay', this.syncForm.weekDay)
        
        // 同步 TXT 内容
        const txtContent = this.generateContent('txt')
        //await this.syncToGithub(txtContent, `playlist/${this.syncForm.txtPath}`)
        await this.syncToGithub(txtContent, this.syncForm.txtPath)


        // 同步 M3U 内容
        const m3uContent = this.generateContent('m3u')
        //await this.syncToGithub(m3uContent, `playlist/${this.syncForm.m3uPath}`)
        await this.syncToGithub(m3uContent, this.syncForm.m3uPath)

        this.$message.success('同步成功')
        this.syncDialogVisible = false
      } catch (error) {
        this.$message.error(error.message || '同步失败')
      }
    },
    async syncToGithub(content, path) {
      const response = await fetch(`${this.getBaseUrl()}/api/sync-github`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          token: this.syncForm.token,
          repo: this.syncForm.repo,
          path: path,
          content: content,
          message: this.syncForm.message
        })
      })
      
      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error('同步失败')
      }
    },
    handleAutoSyncChange(value) {
      if (value) {
        this.setupSyncSchedule()
      } else {
        this.clearSyncSchedule()
      }
    },
    setupSyncSchedule() {
      this.clearSyncSchedule()
      this.syncTimer = setInterval(() => {
        const now = new Date()
        const [hours, minutes] = this.syncForm.executeTime.split(':').map(Number)
        
        if (now.getHours() === hours && now.getMinutes() === minutes) {
          if (this.syncForm.syncType === 'weekly') {
            if (now.getDay().toString() === this.syncForm.weekDay) {
              this.handleSync()
            }
          } else {
            this.handleSync()
          }
        }
      }, 60000) // 每分钟检查一次
    },
    clearSyncSchedule() {
      if (this.syncTimer) {
        clearInterval(this.syncTimer)
        this.syncTimer = null
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    // 只监听数据变化
    streamList: {
      handler() {
        this.updateLinkContent()
        this.saveState()
      },
      deep: true
    },
    currentPage() {
      this.saveState()
    },
    pageSize() {
      this.saveState()
    },
    // 监听所有可能的运行状态
    isChecking() {
      this.updateActiveStatus()
    },
    isCollecting() {
      this.updateActiveStatus()
    },
    isScheduled() {
      this.updateActiveStatus()
    },
    // 添加格式变化监听
    'linkForm.format'() {
      if (this.generateLinkDialogVisible) {
        this.handleGenerateLink()
      }
    }
  },
  // 组件被激活时（重新显示）
  activated() {
    // 如果有定时任务，恢复定时器
    if (this.isScheduled) {
      this.setupSchedule()
    }
    // 如果有采集任务，恢复采集
    if (this.isCollecting) {
      this.startCollecting(true)
    }
  },
  // 组件被停用时（离开但不销毁）
  deactivated() {
    // 暂停定时器，但保持状态标志
    if (this.scheduleTimer) {
      clearInterval(this.scheduleTimer)
      this.scheduleTimer = null
    }
    // 暂停采集定时器，但保持状态标志
    if (this.collectTimer) {
      clearInterval(this.collectTimer)
      this.collectTimer = null
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.stream-check {
  padding: 25px;
  background-color: #fff;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.table-operations {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 10px; /* 按钮组之间的间距 */
}

.pagination-container {
  margin-top: 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

.el-button [class*="el-icon-"] {
  font-size: 18px;
}

.delete-btn {
  color: #F56C6C;
}

.delete-btn:hover {
  color: #ff4d4d;
}

.setting-tip {
  margin-left: 10px;
  color: #909399;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.link-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 10px;
}

.link-info p {
  margin: 0;
  color: #606266;
}

.link-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 10px;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  margin-top: 10px;
}

/* 生成链接对话框样式 */
.generate-link-dialog {
  max-width: 600px;
}

.link-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 15px;
}

.link-card, .tips-card {
  margin: 0;
  border: 1px solid #EBEEF5;
}

.link-content {
  padding: 10px;
}

.tips-content {
  color: #606266;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px;
}

.tips-content ul {
  margin: 0;
  padding-left: 20px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

/* 覆盖 element-ui 的一些默认样式 */
:deep(.el-dialog__body) {
  padding: 20px;
}

:deep(.el-card__header) {
  padding: 12px 20px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

:deep(.el-card__body) {
  padding: 15px;
}

/* 可以添加一些自定义样式 */
.el-tag {
  width: 90px;  /* 统一标签宽度 */
}

.el-tag + .el-tag {
  margin-left: 4px;
}
</style>
